unnormalised: Hey guys, any news on Dhawan's injury? Heard it's his knee again! Hope he recovers before the Asia Cup. Remember how Jadeja got sidelined just before the T20 World Cup? What a setback that was! This feels like a repeat of the Chak De! India film, so much pressure on the team. Any update on Bumrah’s back, too? And how many kms is it from the NCA to Eden Gardens? Get well soon, champ!
normalised: Hey guys, any news on Dhawan's injury? Heard it's his knee again! Hope he recovers before the Asia Cup. Remember how Jadeja got sidelined just before the T-twenty World Cup? What a setback that was! This feels like a repeat of the Chak De! India film, so much pressure on the team. Any update on Bumrah’s back, too? And how many kilometers is it from the N C A to Eden Gardens? Get well soon, champ!
